fallback_manifest_arguments_install_help:
Only for failure auto detection.
Should be obviously an address on another server !
You should desactive the encryption only if your fallback server is really safe.
It's needed if you not turn off the encryption.
Choose 'main server' if you make an installation on your real server. Or 'fallback server' if it's your backup server.
The public key will be given at the end of the install process for the main server.
This server has to be up, for the ssh-keyscan command.
